newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil markets close for Christmas bank holiday.
newsitem.headline: Brazil markets close for Christmas bank holiday.

text.p: Most Brazilian financial markets were closed on Tuesday for the Christmas holidays. They will also close on Wednesday and reopen on Thursday,
Traders on the commercial and floating rate dollar-real currency markets BRBY reported thin trading as banks closed positions before the end of the year.
Brazilian markets will also close on Dec 31 and Jan 1 for New Year celebrations.
